1.1.1.en:
fix set of states in States-Tab
show history data from adapter and not from updates
change default chart to flot
fix error if host has no IP address
show on the bottom only adapters without config and without links
fix filter in adapters if upper case
change file open from selectID Dialog

desc.en: Opens a webserver for the ioBroker admin UI
desc.de: Stellt Webserver für 'ioBroker Admin UI' zur Verfügung
desc.ru: Запускает веб сервер с 'ioBroker admin UI' для удобной настройки через веб интерфейс
